mapper.select: SELECT MENU_CODE , MENU_NAME , MENU_URI FROM ADMIN_MENU
SELECT SUB_MENU_CODE , SUB_MENU_NAME , MENU_URI , MENU_CODE FROM SUB_MENU WHERE MENU_CODE = #{menuCode} ORDER BY SUB_MENU_CODE

SELECT ORDER_NUM , MEM_ID , MEM_NAME , BUY_DATE , ROW_NUM FROM ( SELECT ORDER_NUM , MEM_ID , MEM_NAME , BUY_DATE , ROWNUM AS ROW_NUM FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ORDER_NUM , MEM_ID , (SELECT MEM_NAME FROM SHOP_MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = SHOP_BUY.MEM_ID) AS MEM_NAME , TO_CHAR(BUY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS BUY_DATE FROM SHOP_BUY WHERE 1 = 1
AND UPPER(ORDER_NUM) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{searchOrderNum}||'%')
AND (UPPER(MEM_ID) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{searchBuyer}||'%') OR UPPER((SELECT MEM_NAME FROM SHOP_MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = SHOP_BUY.MEM_ID)) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{searchBuyer}||'%'))
AND TO_CHAR(BUY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #{searchFromDate} AND TO_CHAR(BUY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= #{searchToDate} ORDER BY BUY_DATE DESC ) ) WHERE ROW_NUM >= #{startNum} AND ROW_NUM <= #{endNum}

SELECT IMG.ATTACHED_IMG_NAME , ITEM.ITEM_NAME , BUY.ITEM_CNT , BUY.BUY_PRICE , BUY.MEM_ID , MEMBER.MEM_NAME FROM SHOP_BUY BUY, SHOP_ITEM ITEM, ITEM_IMAGE IMG, SHOP_MEMBER MEMBER WHERE BUY.ITEM_CODE = ITEM.ITEM_CODE AND BUY.ITEM_CODE = IMG.ITEM_CODE AND BUY.MEM_ID = MEMBER.MEM_ID AND IS_MAIN = 'Y' AND ORDER_NUM = #{orderNum}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ORDER_NUM) FROM SHOP_BUY WHERE 1 = 1
AND UPPER(ORDER_NUM) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{searchOrderNum}||'%')
AND (UPPER(MEM_ID) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{searchBuyer}||'%') OR UPPER((SELECT MEM_NAME FROM SHOP_MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = SHOP_BUY.MEM_ID)) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{searchBuyer}||'%'))
AND TO_CHAR(BUY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #{searchFromDate} AND TO_CHAR(BUY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= #{searchToDate}
